text: Ignacio Raúl Sánchez Barrera (born June 20, 1972) is a Mexican football manager and former player. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Club Puebla players Category:C.F.
